@template public
{{div: class=white}}
{{div2: class=container | ng-app | ng-controller=MachinePricingController}}

@col 12

h1. Pricing


{{div: class=row}}
    {{div2: class=col-xs-12 col-md-2 | ng-repeat=plan in linuxPlans}}
        {{div3: class=panel panel-primary}}
            {{div4: class=cnrflash | ng-show=plan.recommended}}
                {{div5: class=cnrflash-inner}}
                    {{span: class=cnrflash-label}}
                        MOST @LF POPULAR
                    {{span}}
                {{div5}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-heading}}
                {{html: <h3 class="headPrice"> {[plan.name]} </h3>}}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-body}}
                {{div5: class=the-price}}
                    {{html:<h1>${[plan.price]}<span class=subscript>/{[pricingModel]}</span></h1>}}
                {{div5}}
                {{html:
                <table class="table">
                    <tr><td>{[plan.mem]} Memory</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>{[plan.cores]} 
                        <ng-pluralize count="plan.cores" when="{'one': 'Core', 'other': 'Cores'}">
                    </td></tr>
                    <tr><td>{[plan.primary]}GB SSD Storage<br>Scale to 100GB</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Snapshots</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Backup</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Firewall & VPN</td></tr>
                    <tr><td>Unlimited Transfer*</td></tr>
                </table>
                }}
            {{div4}}
            {{div4: class=panel-footer}}
                {{html:<a href="/$$space/SignUp" class="btn btn-success" role="button">Sign Up</a>}}
            {{div4}}
        {{div3}}
    {{div2}}



{{div}}





{{html:


<table class="techspecs">
    <tr>
        <th  class="title">All Plans Include:</th>

        <td class="column-divider"></td>
        <td class="full-span full-span2">
            <ul>
                <li>Cloud Space with defense shield</li>
                <li>Choice of standard Linux and Windows templates</li>
                <li>All functions as described in the Machine Deck</li>
                <li class="motherShipSub">Disaster Recovery Backup (managed by Mothership<sup>1</sup>)</li>
                <li>Monitoring by Mothership Operations</li>
                <li>99.99% Uptime SLA</li>
            </ul>

        </td>
        <td class="justBorder2">
            

        </td>
        <td class="justBorder2">
            

        </td>
        <td class="justBorder2">
            

        </td>
        <td class="justBorder2">
            

        </td>


    </tr>


</table>

}}

(*) Unlimited Transfer is subject to fair use policy as descibed in the FAQ section

@divend
@divend
@divend
